product_name: Kiehl's Since 1851Age Defender Eye Repair Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Kiehl's Since 1851 Age Defender Eye Repair Cream is an anti-aging eye cream for men that lifts, firms and visibly reduces dark circles.
details: DetailsBenefitsSmooths and firms men's skin to diminish the appearance of crow's feet and under-eye wrinklesInstantly brightens and helps reduce dark circles under eyesFor men's skinKey IngredientsRye Seed Extract: known to help smooth and firm skin; it helps reduce the appearance of under-eye wrinkles and crow's feetLinseed Extract: expressed from the oil-rich seeds of the flax flower; it is known to help reduce wrinkles and visibly firm skinBlurring Minerals: reflect light and help to minimize the appearance of dark circles and brighten the eye areaItem 2536628How To UseUsing the fingertip, apply a small amount along the orbital bone and under-eye areaPat gently without pulling skinIngredientsAqua / Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter / Cocoa Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Poly C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Sucrose Stearate, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Synthetic Wax, Sodium Polyacrylate, Phenoxyethanol, Nylon-12, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Secale Cereale Seed Extract / Rye Seed Extract, Caffeine, Chlorphenesin, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Hydrolyzed Linseed Extract, Dimethiconol, Tocopherol, Mica, Myristic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Adenosine, Glycine Soja Protein / Soybean Protein, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Saccharum Officinarum Extract / Sugar Cane Extract, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Fruit Water / Orange Fruit Water, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract / Lemon Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tin Oxide, Acer Saccharum Extract / Sugar Maple Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Using the fingertip, apply a small amount along the orbital bone and under-eye areaPat gently without pulling skin
ingredients: Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter / Cocoa Seed Butter
Secale Cereale Seed Extract / Rye Seed Extract
Saccharum Officinarum Extract / Sugar Cane Extract
Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Fruit Water / Orange Fruit Water
Citrus Limon Fruit Extract / Lemon Fruit Extract
Acer Saccharum Extract / Sugar Maple Extract

reviews.headline: Definitely creamyâ€¦
reviews.comments: I have bought my husband his 3rd jar and he says it burns a little but then you rub in and it's good. Caffeine products usually do this to him but I noticed his wrinkles aren't as intense and definitely smoother. He also looks fresh in the morning after getting ready. He says that the caffeine makes him look and feel awake. I agree.

reviews.headline: Possibly Give It A Try
reviews.comments: Has had no effect for me.  Used it every day for a month and then on and off for the last year and it literally has had no change for the bags under my eyes.  Based on the reviews it appears it works for some people so I would suggest giving it a try.

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: I am a WOMAN! so my sister and both bought this, we both have dry skin, we love this stuff! it is very hydrating.. I've aslo tried the avocado one and I like this one better a little goes a long way and I use this twice a day and share with my Bae ,he loves it to, it's just so good

reviews.headline: Tightening and nourishing.
reviews.comments: Ordering this again. Nice thick consistency that goes a long way. I can feel it working for most of the day.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This product is the same as "Facial Fuel Heavy Lifting Eye Repair" for those who have used and loved that product. For those who have never tried it, today is the day!
This is balm-like eye cream that needs only a little bit per application to work effectively. I've found this product to be superbly effective against dark circles and fine lines. Especially impressive on top of Line-Reducing Eye-Brightening Concentrate. 
This is an eye repair not to overlook. Great for both Men and Women who want the best eye cream in their life.
faceoff_positive.headline: Superbly Effective Eye Cream That Works For Men and Women!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using this product every day and in my opinion this product is not worth the money. There are better products on this website than the new Age Defender Eye Repair. For one, the cream is very heavy and its hard to work with, clumpy and does not smooth out using your ring finger.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not Worth the Money
